name: 3D Labs HTX 0.4 nozzle
machine_end_gcode:
M104 S0 T1 ; turn off extruder T1
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M141 S0 ; turn off chamber
M106 P0 S0; turn off part cooling fan
M106 P1 S0; turn off HEPA filter fans
T0 ; necessary to reset the gcode offsets if we were using T1
G1 X150 Y300 F4000
machine_start_gcode:
G28 ; home all axes
DEPLOY_ACTIVE_EXTRUDER

G1 Z5 F5000 ; lift nozzle
G1 X150 Y300 F5000 ; Move into preheat position

M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer]; Heat up bed
M141 S[chamber_temperature]
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer] ; Heat up bed and wait
M191 S[chamber_temperature]; Heat up chamber and wait

; The following will level the bed before each print, for only the area being printed on
; Comment this out if you want to disable this behavior
;BED_MESH_CALIBRATE AREA_START={first_layer_print_min[0]},{first_layer_print_min[1]} AREA_END={first_layer_print_max[0]},{first_layer_print_max[1]}
T[current_extruder]; Set the active extruder - needed after partial leveling above

{if initial_extruder == 0}
M104 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[0]} T0; Heat up the nozzle
M109 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[0]} T0; Heat up the nozzle and wait
{elsif initial_extruder == 1}
M104 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[1]} T1; Heat up the nozzle
M109 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[1]} T1; Heat up the nozzle and wait
{endif}

G28 ; home all axes to compensate for nozzle temperature thermal expansion
T[current_extruder]; Set the active extruder
